movies.title: The Terminator
movies.Plot: A cyborg assassin from the future attempts to find and kill a young woman who is destined to give birth to a warrior that will lead a resistance to save humankind from extinction.

movies.title: Timecop
movies.Plot: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

movies.title: Dante's Peak
movies.Plot: A volcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second-most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that a nearby long-dormant volcano may awaken at any moment.

movies.title: Double Team
movies.Plot: An international spy teams up with an arms dealer to escape from a penal colony and rescue his family from a terrorist.

movies.title: Anaconda
movies.Plot: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

movies.title: Face/Off
movies.Plot: To foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent assumes the identity of the criminal who murdered his son via facial transplant surgery, but the crook wakes up prematurely and vows revenge.

movies.title: Godzilla
movies.Plot: French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.

movies.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
movies.Plot: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

movies.title: Indian
movies.Plot: A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

movies.title: Conan the Destroyer
movies.Plot: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

movies.title: Dune
movies.Plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.Plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

movies.title: Battlefield Earth
movies.Plot: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

movies.title: Hollow Man
movies.Plot: A brilliant scientist's discovery renders him invisible, but transforms him into an omnipotent, dangerous megalomaniac.

movies.title: The Patriot
movies.Plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

movies.title: Mashaal
movies.Plot: A chain of events changes Vinod's life - from honest journalist to black marketer to an underworld Don and a Racketeer in order to combat Vardhan.

movies.title: Charlie's Angels
movies.Plot: Three private investigators are assigned to track down a kidnapped software engineer, but the case isn't as straightforward as it seems.

movies.title: Cast Away
movies.Plot: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

movies.title: The One
movies.Plot: A rogue Multiverse agent goes on a manhunt for alternate versions of himself, getting stronger with each kill. Only the last version of himself, an LASD cop, can stop his crusade before he becomes "The One".

movies.title: Vijay
movies.Plot: Vijay is a story about people that are bound by relationships of love and friendship and how they become foes and take up weapons against each other.

movies.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
movies.Plot: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

movies.title: The End of Evangelion
movies.Plot: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995).

movies.title: Hellboy
movies.Plot: A demon raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

movies.title: Man on Fire
movies.Plot: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

movies.title: Johnny Mnemonic
movies.Plot: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

movies.title: Labyrinth
movies.Plot: Teenage Sarah journeys through a maze to save her baby brother from the Goblin King.

movies.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
movies.Plot: A husband and wife struggle to keep their marriage alive until they realize they are both secretly working as assassins. Now, their respective assignments require them to kill each other.

movies.title: The Island
movies.Plot: In 2019, a mercenary pursues a man and woman who escaped a research facility after learning their true fate.

movies.title: Four Brothers
movies.Plot: When their adoptive mother is gunned down in a store robbery, four brothers decide to investigate the murder and find the killers themselves, but not all is what it seems.

movies.title: Dhoom: 2
movies.Plot: Mr A, a fearless thief, steals valuable artefacts and teams up with the girl he is attracted to but cannot trust. Close on their heels are three police officers trying to apprehend them.

movies.title: Pineapple Express
movies.Plot: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

movies.title: The A-Team
movies.Plot: A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

movies.title: The Hurt Locker
movies.Plot: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

movies.title: District 9
movies.Plot: In a future Earth in which aliens are isolated in a remote ghetto, a government agent finds himself banished there.

movies.title: Ip Man
movies.Plot: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to ...

movies.title: Ip Man 2
movies.Plot: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

movies.title: 30 Minutes or Less
movies.Plot: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...

movies.title: Sniper: Reloaded
movies.Plot: The son of a renowned sniper decides to track down the sniper who ambushed his squad when they were sent to rescue a white planter in the Congo.

movies.title: Colombiana
movies.Plot: A professional assassin seeks revenge for the murder of her parents.

movies.title: Never Back Down 2: The Beatdown
movies.Plot: Four fighters with different backgrounds come together to train under an ex-MMA rising star and then ultimately have to fight each other.

movies.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
movies.Plot: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

movies.title: Hit & Run
movies.Plot: Four friends hit a man while driving and must dispose of the body.

movies.title: Elysium
movies.Plot: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

movies.title: Stolen
movies.Plot: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

movies.title: Oblivion
movies.Plot: A stranger's arrival triggers one man's battle to save mankind.

movies.title: Lone Survivor
movies.Plot: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

movies.title: This Is the End
movies.Plot: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.

movies.title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
movies.Plot: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called the Shadow World.

movies.title: Aurangzeb
movies.Plot: Kingship knows no Kinship and there can be only one Emperor in Aurangzeb's world. In Gurgaon, to bring down a criminal the law has to think like one.

movies.title: Sabotage
movies.Plot: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

movies.title: Dhoom: 3
movies.Plot: Jai and Ali return to catch the clown thief, Sahir, who has targeted various branches of the Western Bank of Chicago.

movies.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
movies.Plot: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

movies.title: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods
movies.Plot: After sleeping for 39 years, the God of destruction Beerus is surprised to learn that Frieza was defeated by the saiyajin Goku. Upon finding him, Goku is excited to face him, but realizes that his powers are negligible compared to...

movies.title: Kick
movies.Plot: An adrenaline junkie walks away from a whirlwind romance and embraces a new life as a thief, though he soon finds himself pursued by veteran police officer and engaged in a turf war with a local gangster.

movies.title: Fury
movies.Plot: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

movies.title: Unbroken
movies.Plot: After a near-fatal plane crash in WWII, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught by the Japanese navy and sent to a prisoner-of-war camp.

movies.title: Gunday
movies.Plot: The lives of Calcutta's most powerful Gunday, Bikram and Bala, changes when Nandita enters it. Then a counter-force takes charge and a thriller unfolds.

movies.title: Swelter
movies.Plot: Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past.

movies.title: Rurouni Kenshin: The Legend Ends
movies.Plot: Shishio has set sail in his ironclad ship to bring down the Meiji government and return Japan to chaos, carrying Kaoru with him. In order to stop him in time, Kenshin trains with his old master to learn his final technique.

movies.title: The Ridiculous 6
movies.Plot: An outlaw who was raised by Native Americans discovers that he has five half-brothers. Together the men go on a mission to find their wayward, deadbeat dad.

movies.title: The Siege of Jadotville
movies.Plot: Irish Commandant Pat Quinlan leads a stand off with troops against French and Belgian Mercenaries in the Congo during the early 1960s.

movies.title: Survivor
movies.Plot: A Foreign Service Officer in London tries to prevent a terrorist attack set to hit New York City, but is forced to go on the run when she is framed for crimes she did not commit.

movies.title: The Do-Over

movies.title: The 5th Wave
movies.Plot: Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth in ruin. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.

movies.title: Ip Man 3
movies.Plot: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over a local school, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

movies.title: The Brothers Grimsby
movies.Plot: A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.

movies.title: True Memoirs of an International Assassin

movies.title: Okja
movies.Plot: A young girl risks everything to prevent a powerful, multinational company from kidnapping her best friend - a fascinating beast named Okja.

movies.title: Gridlocked
movies.Plot: Former SWAT leader David Hendrix and hard-partying movie star Brody Walker must cut their ride-along short when a police training facility is attacked by a team of mercenaries.

movies.title: Spectral
movies.Plot: A sci-fi/thriller story centered on a special-ops team that is dispatched to fight supernatural beings.

movies.title: Fan
movies.Plot: A man named Gaurav is obsessed with Bollywood superstar Aryan Khanna, who he bears a striking resemblance to. However, when his hero rejects him, he decides to seek revenge.

movies.title: Headshot
movies.Plot: Uwais plays a young man who washes ashore, an amnesiac with a serious head injury whose past comes back to haunt him shortly after being nursed back to health by a young doctor. Violence ensues. Sweet, sweet violence.

movies.title: Train to Busan
movies.Plot: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

movies.title: Sand Castle
movies.Plot: The story follows a young soldier, and his introduction into the 2003 invasion of Iraq. Based on true events, it bears witness to the destruction and horrors of war.

movies.title: Bright
movies.Plot: A detective must work with an Orc to find a powerful wand before evil creatures do.

movies.title: Gold
movies.Plot: Kenny Wells, a prospector desperate for a lucky break, teams up with a similarly eager geologist and sets off on a journey to find gold in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia.

movies.title: The Cloverfield Paradox
movies.Plot: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

movies.title: Power Rangers
movies.Plot: When Earth is on the verge of an alien invasion, five teenagers, who are infused with superhuman abilities, must harness their newfound powers to battle this threat - as the Power Rangers.

movies.title: What Happened to Monday
movies.Plot: In a world where families are limited to one child due to overpopulation, a set of identical septuplets must avoid being put to a long sleep by the government and dangerous infighting while investigating the disappearance of one o...

movies.title: Hold the Dark

movies.title: Raees
movies.Plot: A bootlegger sets out to improve his community as a promising leader but falls in a political trap.

movies.title: How It Ends
movies.Plot: In the midst of an apocalypse, a man struggles to reach his pregnant fiancé, who is thousands of miles away.

movies.title: Game Over, Man!
movies.Plot: Three friends are on the verge of getting their video game financed when their benefactor is taken hostage by terrorists.

movies.Plot: When the girl he likes goes missing, Jake enlists the help of his grandpa and Grandpa's former special ops buddies.

movies.title: The Foreigner

movies.Plot: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

movies.title: Rim of the World

movies.title: Guillermo del Toro’s Pinocchio

movies.title: Coffee & Kareem
